duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for tooling design and build to produce parts that meet customer requirements, including communication with customers concerning engineering issues.
Manage documents & forms, including work orders, routings, ECNs, and bill of material to comply with QS procedures.
Coordinate APQP process and procedures relative to individual projects, including FEMA, flow diagram, and control plan.
Keep project on schedule to ensure timely production start-up and delivery of parts to customer.
Coordinate communications and activity of Die Shop, Quality & Production through various stages of development for suppliers.
Assist tool room personnel with troubleshooting production tooling.

education_certification.credential: BA Degree in Mechanical or Industrial Engineering or substantial related experience as die making journeyman & tool design. Formal Journeymen tool & die making background.
